questiontext.text: Below you see variables in a study of physical fitness. Determine which random variable X is a continuous variable:_____________.  I The subject is male or female, X = the number of females. II After every 30 minutes, a along trainer comes to whom you ask to measure your effort. X = the number of times the trainer comes by per day. III You measure the V-O2, the maximum oxygen consumption per minute during exercise. X = the number of liters of oxygen consumption per minute.

answer.text: I is a continuous random variable.

feedback.text: I is a continuous random variable…: Incorrect

answer.text: II is a continuous random variable.

feedback.text: II is a continuous random variable…: Incorrect

answer.text: III is a continuous random variable.

feedback.text: III is a continuous random variable…: Correct

answer.text: I and II are continuous random variables.

feedback.text: I and II are continuous random variables…: Incorrect

answer.text: II and III are continuous random variables.

feedback.text: II and III are continuous random variables…: Incorrect
